variants.Description in input context: The LAMA2 c.2991G>A variant was identified in affected individuals.
The LAMA2 c.3156C>T variant demonstrates altered protein folding.

Material used.Description: Fibroblasts were obtained from biopsies of affected individuals.

Readout description.Result Description: LAMA2 expression was severely reduced (less than 10%) in fibroblasts carrying the c.2991G>A variant.
The LAMA2 protein produced from the fibroblasts carrying c.3156C>T variant exhibits aggregation and altered electrophoretic mobility, suggesting abnormal protein folding.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent fibroblast lines from different patients were analyzed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Fibroblasts from healthy donors were used as positive controls.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells transfected with empty vector were used as negative controls.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA followed by Tukeyâ€™s post-hoc test.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: LAMA2 expression greater than 50% of control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: LAMA2 expression less than 20% of control.
